metadata.title: CVE-2024-26915 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Reset IH OVERFLOW_CLEAR bit Allows us to detect subsequent IHring buffer overflows as well.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
